greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table of number of domino tilings of generalized Aztec pillows of type (1, ..., 1, 3, 1, ..., 1)_n.
comment: The number of tilings of a generalized Aztec pillow of type (k 1's followed by a 3 followed by n-k-1 1's) is entry (n,k+1).
link: C. Hanusa, A Gessel-Viennot-Type Method for Cycle Systems with Applications to Aztec Pillows, PhD Thesis, 2005, University of Washington, Seattle, USA.
example: The number of tilings of a generalized Aztec pillow of type (1,1,3,1)_n is entry (4,3) = 346.
xref: A092440 (main diagonal), A092441 (first subdiagonal), A002522 (column k = 1), A066455 (column k = 2). Cf. A264960.
results.author: Christopher Hanusa (chanusa(AT)math.binghamton.edu), Sep 21 2005
